issue.title: [CF 1505] No options show up in the import string sub menu
issue.body:
I found this profile I really like off reddit, the guy posted his export string but at first it was greyed out, It looked like he just missed a second ^ after the profile at the end and also at the beginning so I tried to fix it. The import from string option turned green but there were no options in the submenu and the import did nothing, I'm brand new and honestly have no idea what i'm doing. This is a link to the reddit page: https://www.reddit.com/r/wow/comments/7uzuqo/my_fury_warrior_ui_setup_for_optimal_dps/

 

and this is the original string (which looks kinda messed up idk why):

 

1TSGroupsT N1T SGUIDSTMW:group:1QRZUU46xM4U SScaleF8256597885190124 f-52SPoint TSyF-4865041806657668 f-45Sx F4911285394847763f-53 tSColumnsN3SIconsT N1T SShowTimerB STypeScooldown SNameSBattle~Cry ^SShowTimerText^B ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N2^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SEnrage ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SOnlyMine^B ^SEnabled^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N3^T ^SType^Scooldown ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SName^SOdyn's~Fury SStatesT N1T tN3T tN4T ttSEnabledB tN4T SStatesT N1T tN3T tN4TttttSOnlyInCombatB tN2T SGUIDSTMW:group:1QTSLvBB4fWw SScaleF8444231584579562 f-52SPoint TSyF7618606263173102 f-46Sx N0.79944133526683SpointSBOTTOMSrelativePoint SBOTTOMt SColumnsN3 SSettingsPerViewT SiconT SSpacingYN2 tSbarT SSizeXF8028430968815603 f-46t tSIconsT N1T SShowTimerBSTypeScooldown SShowTimerTextB SNameSBloodbath SShowTimerTextnoOCCB SStatesT N1T tN3T tN4T ttSEnabledB tN2T SShowTimerB STypeSbuffSNameSFrothing~Berserker ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SOnlyMine^B ^SEnabled^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N3^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SName^SEnraged~Regeneration SStatesT N1TtN3T tN4T ttSEnabledB tN4T SStatesT N1T tN3T tN4T ttttSOnlyInCombatB ttSNumGroupsN2 SVersionN84201 tN84201S~~| ^Sprofile^SCalethra~-~`Frostmane ^


> Posted by CurseForge user joset98 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1505 | Raw

comments.body:
That string isn't anywhere close to valid. Reddit isn't a suitable place for sharing strings in the body of a post or comment because Reddit's formatting will mangle them terribly. Here's the correctly formatted form of what you're looking for (from the source of the comment, only possible on old.reddit.com, also might be an RES feature but I'm not sure):

 

^1^T^SGroups^T ^N1^T ^SGUID^STMW:group:1QRZUU46xM4U ^SScale^F8256597885190124 ^f-52^SPoint ^T^Sy^F-4865041806657668 ^f-45^Sx ^F4911285394847763^f-53 ^t^SColumns^N3 ^SIcons^T ^N1^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SBattle~`Cry ^SShowTimerText^B ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N2^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SEnrage ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SOnlyMine^B ^SEnabled^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N3^T ^SType^Scooldown ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SName^SOdyn's~`Fury ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N4^T ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^t^SOnlyInCombat^B ^t^N2^T ^SGUID^STMW:group:1QTSLvBB4fWw ^SScale^F8444231584579562 ^f-52^SPoint ^T^Sy^F7618606263173102 ^f-46^Sx ^N0.79944133526683^Spoint ^SBOTTOM^SrelativePoint ^SBOTTOM^t ^SColumns^N3 ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^SSpacingY^N2 ^t^Sbar^T ^SSizeX^F8028430968815603 ^f-46^t ^t^SIcons^T ^N1^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SShowTimerText^B ^SName^SBloodbath ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N2^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SFrothing~`Berserker ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SOnlyMine^B ^SEnabled^B ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^N3^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SShowTimerTextnoOCC^B ^SName^SEnraged~`Regeneration ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N4^T ^SStates^T ^N1^T ^t^N3^T ^t^N4^T ^t^t^t^t^SOnlyInCombat^B ^t^t^SNumGroups^N2 ^SVersion^N84201 ^t^N84201^S~`~| ^Sprofile^SCalethra~`-~`Frostmane ^^

Edited Jul 17, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
